Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters
FASTER THAN THE EYE CAN SEE: Sidestep. // When Quicksilver uses Charge and hits, after resolutions roll a d6. 4-6: Choose one: *Action total +1 until the end of the turn. *You may place him in the square he occupied when given the action.
SUPERSONIC PUNCH: When Quicksilver uses Charge and moves in a direct path, he has KNOCKBACK this action.

December 24, 2021
Hellboy the Bellboy
One of the main differences between the Flash and Quicksilver is how they perceive the passage of time. Flash is able to experience time normally so he doesn't go insane. Quicksilver can't regulate his perception of time, he's in a slow world always waiting for it to catch up. "Have you ever stood in line at a banking machine behind a person who didn't know how to use it?... Now, imagine, Doctor, that everyone you work with, everywhere you go, your entire world is filled with people who can't work cash machines". This is a long way of saying: It has always been a crime to deprive Pietro of HSS.
December 23, 2021
gambitrmp

Why take out a power to make things easier, only to add complex traits that basically do the same thing, only worse? WK really screwed the pooch with the rule changes.

Goop
Knockback isn't as good as it once was since the damage has been removed. This guy can be pretty annoying though if you can keep rolling that 4-6 to jump away. He has good attack/def values and that improved movement is very useful too. He's good for his points.
